meanings.definition: The act of gathering or harvesting oysters.
meanings.sent1: Oystering is a common activity along the coast.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed oystering together on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The oystering competition at the festival was intense.
meanings.sent4: She approached her work with the precision of an oystering expert.
meanings.sent5: The sound of oystering boats filled the air with excitement.

meanings.definition: The practice of cultivating or farming oysters.
meanings.sent2: The oystering industry plays a vital role in the local economy.
meanings.sent3: His backyard was like an oystering paradise.
meanings.sent4: The art of oystering is passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The oystering process involves careful nurturing of the oysters.

meanings.definition: The business or industry of selling oysters.
meanings.sent1: She manages a successful oystering company.
meanings.sent2: Oystering has been booming in the market this year.
meanings.sent3: The oystering trade requires good negotiation skills.
meanings.sent4: Investing in oystering can be a lucrative venture.
meanings.sent5: The history of oystering in this town dates back centuries.
